name: places/ChIJH1PbpAFZwokRGqOGhzV75Mk
formattedAddress: 518 E 80th St, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 518 E 80th St, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: Lily was so sweet, patient, empathetic and professional! I originally decided to come because of the high ratings and am so glad I found her. When I reached out, she was very responsive to all my questions and even did a sketch so I knew what to expect. Even throughout the whole appointment, I could tell Lily was very dedicated to her work and really ensures that you like the design before she starts microblading. Throughout the process she would also continuously check in with me to make sure I felt comfortable, and the result came out to be exactly how I wanted! Her volunteer work is very heartwarming as well. Will definitely be back, thank you so much!

originalText.text: Mingy is so wonderful and kind.  She gives very professional recommendations so you're happy with the finished product. Her work space is very nice and clean and she makes sure you're comfortable. My brows are sporadic but after she fixed it up. It looks fuller and with nice shape. I'm very happy with the result! Thank you, Mingy!

originalText.text: I can't say enough about how amazing my experience I've had with Minji. She is a true professional with amazing skill for putting you at ease and doing wonders with your face/eyebrows especially when you are going through a difficult journey. She has a huge heart and you can feel how much she enjoys what she does. And my eyebrows never looked this good! I cannot wait for them to heal! She has helped me immensely physically and emotionally/psychologically.

originalText.text: I had old tattoo work that turned a red/orange color. Lily was honest from the beginning and told me that it’ll take at least 2-3 sessions, 6 weeks apart, to color-correct my brows. I was ecstatic after the first session but the pigment didn’t stick. I was feeling discouraged. However, Lily assured me to be patient and stick through with the other two sessions. Voila! I got the brows I’ve been dreaming of. I feel so confident now when I wake up. I don’t have to spend 20 minutes on my brows anymore. Thank you, Lily!

text.text: I had old tattoo work that turned a red/orange color. Lily was honest from the beginning and told me that it’ll take at least 2-3 sessions, 6 weeks apart, to color-correct my brows. originalText.text: I've been battling with breast cancer. Due to chemo treatments, I have lost my hair. I am someone who does meticulous research before I go into something. I was willing to pay a thousands of dollars for microblading knowing how difficult it is to create natural looking brows on bare skin without any hair. One thing if you have any hair left..... I was led to Lily through word of mouth. I loved how she offers Madison avenue quality services at the half of price. Honestly, I felt so much more comfortable and welcome at her place. She asked me questions that other places didn't care to ask- if I have any allergies or keloids scarring. When Lily showed me when brows were done, I cried. I referred other cancer patients from my support group. She really changed our lives. We wanted to do something nice for her so we all signed a thank you card, and asked our wealthy family friends to make a donation so Lily can continue her work! She needs to be valued for her work. Thank you Lily
